Text: Me̩ gbʼo̩la-i, ame̩ amole okuno̩ e-Beshan,
Oñ ame̩ ale e̩kpana e̩kpana aku dufu,
Me̩ lewa Be̩te̩l ku me̩ jʼada ke;
me̩ ki kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ugwa kʼo̩jo̩wu dʼef uwñ wa gujo,
Omi laño̩ kʼenyi efe̩ ñw me̩ ewo ewo-me̩ du,
U ño̩ fʼomi ojale fa wʼubi bʼume̩ te̩
abe̩le̩ ewo meji ñe̩ta tale wʼemi wʼemi gbogbo nyʼewoʼka
U kʼikpetubi kpʼe̩wñ ekpebu kpa me̩;
U dʼe̩wñ ibi kpuche̩ wʼef ume̩ alu ki de̩ Ijipti;
U la fʼewo ewo gulo̩ ef ume̩,
Todule̩, e̩wñ kʼu nachʼe̩ de̩, O Israe̩l;
Todule̩, go, e̩ne̩ ki abo̩ ewo uwo jo̩, kʼi la nyʼafu ki aju,
